attributes.additional_details: There should be work provided to children which don’t have access to remote learning every week excluding holidays and there should be a promotion of online learning where possible to reduce the amount of school time lost and by having students work from home it will reduce the amount of covid infections as shown by the first full lockdown as cases were much lower before “eat out to help out” during the summer months
attributes.background: I would like to have schools close for a month because I believe it will reduce the amount of covid infections and reduce the strain on the nhs during the winter months where there will be a lot of pressure on them to keep the public safe from the virus

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012
